content:
Infused water and fresh fruit are a great way to start making healthy changes!

As for healthy lunch options near your office, I'd be happy to help you with that! However, I need a bit more information from you. Could you please provide me with:

1. Your office location (city, state, or zip code)?
2. What type of cuisine are you in the mood for (e.g., salads, sandwiches, Asian, Mexican, etc.)?
3. Are there any specific dietary restrictions or preferences (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free, dairy-free) you'd like me to consider?

Once I have this information, I can provide you with some personalized recommendations for healthy places to grab lunch near your office with quick service or take-out options.

In the meantime, you can also try searching online for "healthy lunch spots near me" or "quick and healthy lunch near [your office location]" to find some options in your area. You can also check out review websites like Yelp or Google Maps to read reviews and find places that fit your criteria.

Remember, even small changes to your daily routine can make a big difference in your overall health and well-being!
